body_html: Unfortunately, because this is cell is fused in time, adding dropout would require modifying the C++ code that performs the computation to add proper random number generation and dropout. Work in this direction is not planned at the moment but I'll ping @ekelsen to get his thoughts on feasibility.

body: Unfortunately, because this is cell is fused in time, adding dropout would require modifying the C++ code that performs the computation to add proper random number generation and dropout.  Work in this direction is not planned at the moment but I'll ping @ekelsen  to get his thoughts on feasibility.
